mapper.select: SELECT er.*, sd.department_name, su.name as doctor_name, ep.package_name FROM exam_record er LEFT JOIN sys_department sd ON er.department_id = sd.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON er.doctor_id = su.id LEFT JOIN exam_package ep ON er.package_id = ep.id WHERE er.id = #{id}

SELECT er.*, sd.department_name, su.name as doctor_name, ep.package_name FROM exam_record er LEFT JOIN sys_department sd ON er.department_id = sd.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON er.doctor_id = su.id LEFT JOIN exam_package ep ON er.package_id = ep.id WHERE er.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY er.exam_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_record SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
